content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでも、プリマがお前に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apparently, Prima wants to slap a severance letter on you."},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶縁状叩きつけたいんだと」","translatedEnglishLine":"She said she wants to throw a breakup letter at you.\""},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それ、本気で言ってるの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you serious about that?\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うぐぅっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-ugh!?\""},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんな顔、しても！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-don't make that face!"},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だだだ、駄目だよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, no, that's not allowed!\""},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ももももも、もう私の意思は固いんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-m-m-my decision is already firm!\""},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"「意思は固いかも知れんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your decision might be firm, but"},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごい及び腰だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"you're really hesitant.\""},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと黙ってな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Be quiet for a moment!\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ななな、なにさ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-w-what is this...\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ドサッ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Thud>"},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあっ！？　わわ、なになになに！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah!? Wha-wha-what is this!?!\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"メガデスがプリマに抱きついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Megadeth threw herself into Prima's arms."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やだぁぁぁあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooooo...\""},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、ええええええ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, eeeeeeh!?\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No...\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"　プリマ、お願い、捨てないで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Prima, please, don't throw me away...\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、ぐすっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-ugh, sniff...\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、プリマがいないと駄目、なの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't be without Prima...\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪いところあるなら直すから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I have any bad points, I'll fix them...\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひっく、ぐすっ、だ、だから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hic, sniff, so, away...\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うぇぇぇぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaaaah...\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、うう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, uh...\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きゅ、急にそんなこと言われても……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm not sure what to say when you suddenly say didn't know she had such a weak side."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メガデスの意外な姿だな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's an unexpected side of Megadeth..."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、どうすんだ、プリマ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what will you do, Prima?\""},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どう、って言われても……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what do you mean what will I do...\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっく、ぐすっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hic, sniff...\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"プリマは自分の胸で泣いているメガデスを、","translatedEnglishLine":"Prima was frozen, unsure how to handle Megadeth who was crying on her Fine. I forgive you.\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホントにー？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really?\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"　良かったー☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"Great☆\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええええええっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eeeeeeh!?\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああああ、あんた、今までの！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaaah, all this time, you were just..."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　――嘘泣き！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"—faking those tears!?\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メガデスのしそうなことではないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's not something Megadeth would do."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メガデス、メガデス、うっせーな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Megadeth, Megadeth, shut up already."},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"　モロミちゃんって呼べっつってんだろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":"I told you to call me Moromi-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、いーや。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, whatever."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はー、真面目な話したら疲れたー。","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew, talking seriously is tiring."},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご飯でも食べに行こうーっと」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go grab some food or something.\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait a minute...\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, Prima wants to slap a severance letter on you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶縁状叩きつけたいんだと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She said she wants to throw a breakup letter at you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ももももも、もう私の意思は固いんだ！」
「わあっ！？　わわ、なになになに！？」
メガデスがプリマに抱きついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megadeth threw herself into Prima's arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリマ、お願い、捨てないで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prima, please, don't throw me away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、プリマがいないと駄目、なの……」
「悪いところあるなら直すから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I have any bad points, I'll fix them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっく、ぐすっ、だ、だから……」
「お願いだから、捨てないでよぉ……
きゅ、急にそんなこと言われても……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I'm not sure what to say when you suddenly say that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな弱い一面があったとは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't know she had such a weak side.
It's an unexpected side of Megadeth...
"W-what do you mean what will I do..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリマは自分の胸で泣いているメガデスを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prima was frozen, unsure how to handle Megadeth who was crying on her chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どう扱えばいいのか分からない顔で固まっていた。
性格直してくれるって言うなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say you'll fix your personality..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目ってことはないんだけど、さ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like I can't accept it, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、じゃあこれからも一緒にいていい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-so, can I stay with you from now on?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かった分かった。いいよ。許す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay, okay. Fine. I forgive you."
"Aaaaah, all this time, you were just...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メガデスのしそうなことではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not something Megadeth would do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メガデス、メガデス、うっせーな。
モロミちゃんって呼べっつってんだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you to call me Moromi-chan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はー、真面目な話したら疲れたー。
ご飯でも食べに行こうーっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go grab some food or something."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, Prima wants to slap a severance letter on you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶縁状叩きつけたいんだと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She said she wants to throw a breakup letter at you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ももももも、もう私の意思は固いんだ！」
「わあっ！？　わわ、なになになに！？」
メガデスがプリマに抱きついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megadeth threw herself into Prima's arms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリマ、お願い、捨てないで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prima, please, don't throw me away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、プリマがいないと駄目、なの……」
「悪いところあるなら直すから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I have any bad points, I'll fix them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっく、ぐすっ、だ、だから……」
「お願いだから、捨てないでよぉ……
きゅ、急にそんなこと言われても……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I'm not sure what to say when you suddenly say that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな弱い一面があったとは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't know she had such a weak side.
It's an unexpected side of Megadeth...
"W-what do you mean what will I do..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: プリマは自分の胸で泣いているメガデスを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prima was frozen, unsure how to handle Megadeth who was crying on her chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どう扱えばいいのか分からない顔で固まっていた。
性格直してくれるって言うなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say you'll fix your personality..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目ってことはないんだけど、さ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not like I can't accept it, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、じゃあこれからも一緒にいていい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-so, can I stay with you from now on?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かった分かった。いいよ。許す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay, okay. Fine. I forgive you."
"Aaaaah, all this time, you were just...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メガデスのしそうなことではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not something Megadeth would do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メガデス、メガデス、うっせーな。
モロミちゃんって呼べっつってんだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you to call me Moromi-chan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はー、真面目な話したら疲れたー。
ご飯でも食べに行こうーっと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's go grab some food or something."
